    • Method Detail

      • defaultCenter

        public static SSCenter defaultCenter()
        Returns the system default center, creating one if it has not yet been created.

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.Object signalProvider,
                    java.lang.String signalName,
                    java.lang.Object slotProvider,
                    java.lang.String slotMethod,
                    java.lang.Class<?>... slotArgTypes)
        Adds the specified signal-slot mapping to the SSCenter to enable signaling from the signalProviders to the slotProviders
        Parameters:
        slotProvider - The observer that wishes to be notified (required).
        slotMethod - The method that will be invoked that has arguments of types specified in variable length Class[] slotArgTypes (optional, left empty means no arguments).
        signalName - The name of the signal (required).
        signalProvider - The object that can send signals to its mapped slotProviders. If null, any object can emit this signal.

      • connectWithOneStringArgument

        public void connectWithOneStringArgument(java.lang.Object signalProvider,
                                         java.lang.String signalName,
                                         java.lang.Object slotProvider,
                                         java.lang.String slotMethod)
        Adds the specified signal-slot mapping to the SSCenter to enable signaling from the signalProviders to the slotProviders
        Parameters:
        slotProvider - The observer that wishes to be notified (required).
        slotMethod - The method that will be invoked that has arguments of types specified in variable length Class[] slotArgTypes (optional, left empty means no arguments).
        signalName - The name of the signal (required).
        signalProvider - The object that can send signals to its mapped slotProviders. If null, any object can emit this signal.
